pkgmetadata.longdescription: vvm===|Pypi Status| |Build Status| |Coverage Status|Vyper version management tool.Installation------------via ``pip``~~~~~~~~~~~.. code:: bash pip install vvmvia ``setuptools``~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~.. code:: bash git clone https://github.com/vyperlang/vvm.git cd vvm python3 setup.py installTesting-------``vvm`` is tested on Linux, OSX and Windows with Vyper versions``>=0.1.0-beta.16``.To run the test suite:.. code:: bash pytest tests/By default, the test suite installs all available ``vyper`` versions foryour OS. If you only wish to test against already installed versions,include the ``--no-install`` flag. Use the ``--vyper-verions`` flag totest against one or more specific versions.Contributing------------Help is always appreciated! Feel free to open an issue if you find aproblem, or a pull request if youâ€™ve solved an issue.Please check out our `Contribution Guide <CONTRIBUTING.md>`__ prior toopening a pull request.License-------This project is licensed under the `MIT license <LICENSE>`__... |Pypi Status| image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/vvm.svg :target: https://pypi.org/project/vvm/.. |Build Status| image:: https://img.shields.io/github/workflow/status/vyperlang/vvm/vvm%20workflow :target: https://github.com/vyperlang/vvm/actions.. |Coverage Status| image:: https://img.shields.io/codecov/c/github/vyperlang/vvm :target: https://codecov.io/gh/vyperlang/vvm
